hero.heading: Artsy for Galleries
hero.preamble: Artsy offers a centralized online platform to promote your gallery program, expand your global reach, increase your client base, and support gallery operations with our suite of cloud-based and mobile tools.

sections.title: Network

sections.heading: Reach a global audience of collectors and art lovers
sections.preamble: Since Artsyâ€™s launch in October 2012, more than 7 million unique visitors have explored art on our platform. With a registered user base of over 250,000 people across 186 countries, Artsy is a popular destination for seasoned and aspiring collectors alike. Artsyâ€™s referral traffic from search engines like Google has quadrupled in the last 6 months alone as a result of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) initiatives.

quotes.author: Johnathan Novak
quotes.quote: Artsy has increasingly brought us inquiries and introduced us to qualified collectors world-wide, resulting in substantial sales.

sections.title: Audience

sections.heading: Make it easy for your gallery to be found and followed online
sections.preamble: Artsy partners are provided with a personalized gallery profile page to promote exhibition programming, list artists and inventory, and build a follower base of Artsy users who receive targeted emails when you add new works and shows.
sections.title: Access

sections.heading: Directly manage your Artsy listings and profile
sections.preamble: In addition to public promotion, Artsy partners have access to our cloud-based Content Management System (CMS) to directly update their artwork listings and gallery profile page.
sections.title: Tools

sections.heading: Display and share artworks at the gallery and on the go
sections.preamble: Artsy Folio syncs seamlessly with your CMS to provide a beautiful presentation tool, allowing you to easily browse artists and works and send emails complete with artwork images, supplemental information, and personalized content.
sections.title: Artsy Folio

sections.heading: Weâ€™re with you every step of the way
sections.preamble: Every gallery partner works closely with an Artsy Liaison who will walk you through the setup process and serve as your dedicated contact for ongoing questions and support. Artsy Gallery Liaisons are based in New York, Los Angeles, London, Munich, Berlin, and Hong Kong, so no matter where you are in the world, weâ€™re in a time zone nearby.

quotes.quote: Our Liason, Katherine Gregory Is Fantastic- Highly Competent, Reliable, Responsive, Helpful, And Organized. We Love The Beautiful Artsy Platform And Are Proud To Be A Partner.
